verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: recognized] [ARG1: Jerusalem] [ARG2: as Israel 's capital] [ARGM-TMP: last year] and pledged to move the U.S. embassy there from Tel Aviv .
[ARG0: President Donald Trump] recognized Jerusalem as Israel 's capital last year and [V: pledged] [ARG2: to move the U.S. embassy there from Tel Aviv] .
